item.title: Bryan Adams - Summer Of '69
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Summer Of '69 - Bryan Adams
Using the chords: A Bb Bm C D F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU DU or D DU U DU but try your own out too!
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: OneRepublic - Rescue Me (Acoustic)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Bm. In the original key.
Chords Used: Bm, A, D, G
As performed by OneRepublic. This was a request from my own two boys, age 7 & 10. If you read this comments, they would be thrilled if you watched some of their videos and followed them.
Older son: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnXyBzSlqfs_N0Sz8EeTj7Q Younger son: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLCD1tFgLd6rgT1WzdR4paA
And if you are reading all of this, please follow my other ukulele channel: https://www.youtube.com/ukestuff As these videos cannot be monetized, subscriptions and views on the other channel really will help me out.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/JZA5jnT4brY
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion video is from churchmediadrop.com
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Madness - It Must Be Love
item.description:
Ukulele play along
It Must Be Love - Madness Written by Labi Siffre
Using the chords: Am A7 Bm C D Dm D7 Em E7 G (Some chords have been simplified for teaching purposes) Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Elton John - Crocodile Rock (Remastered)
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Crocodile Rock - Elton John Written by Elton John and Bernie Taupin
Using the chords: A7 Bm C D D7 E7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Varios Artistas - Thinking out Loud
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Thinking Out Loud - Ed Sheeran
Using the chords: A A7 Bm D Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: (slow) DU (slow) DU (fast) DU but worth trying your own too.
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Workout Masters - Just Give Me a Reason
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G. (Original Key)
As performed by Pink, ft. Nate Ruess.
This song was a request from a comment on the Ukulele Tenor YouTube channel.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Want to make a song suggestion? Follow the link and fill out the form! https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvgacvP7hB46DGeJ8o6Gsn7V8JAPsHFo7G-Q4TkiHsILBiAw/viewform?usp=sf_link
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. Patreon rewards include access to my “method” of the video play alongs (to be used in a classroom) as well as some other resources, and starting in 2019, a chord sheet of every song posted as a play along.
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel!

item.title: Cody Simpson - La Da Dee
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G. Raised a whole step from the original.
As performed by Cody Simpson. Used in "Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs 2."
I want to thank my student, Ben C., for suggesting this song as a play along.
Beats 2 & 4 are strong in the chorus of this song; you can use the suggested strumming pattern or make your own.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Want to make a song suggestion? Follow the link and fill out the form! https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvgacvP7hB46DGeJ8o6Gsn7V8JAPsHFo7G-Q4TkiHsILBiAw/viewform?usp=sf_link
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. Patreon rewards include access to my “method” of the video play alongs (to be used in a classroom) as well as some other resources, and starting in 2019, a chord sheet of every song posted as a play along.

item.title: Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper - Shallow (Radio Edit)
Ed Sheeran - What Do I Know?
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play What Do I Know on the ukulele by Ed Sheeran. The chords used are G C D Em Bm. (Original in E)
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: lovelytheband - broken
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of D (or Bm)
As performed by Lovelytheband
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
